name: Alien the Revolt of amogus
description:
Movement: W A S D
Press Space to begin

Left mouse button to shoot.

Power ups:

1- (5 coins) - Fast shoot for 5 sec

2- (8 coins) - Turrets - Create a Turret

3- (10 coins) - Create another Spaceship.

And you have 5 lives.

A nice soundtrack and many more!!! 

Thats all!!! Enjoy!! ^^
